statements: SELECT * FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date, status FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date, progress_percentage FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date, progress_percentage, status FROM student_enrollment WHERE status = 'enrolled' ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date, progress_percentage, status FROM student_enrollment WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE status IN ('completed', 'dropped') AND enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date, progress_percentage, status FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY course_id, enrollment_date LIMIT 5
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date, progress_percentage, status FROM student_enrollment WHERE status = 'enrolled' AND progress_percentage < 50 ORDER BY student_id
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM students, courses WHERE students.student_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, student_id FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT course_name, course_description, course_id FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_description, course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT id, name, age FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT name, age, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT id, name, age, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date, instructor FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date, progress FROM student_enrollment WHERE progress='Completed' ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN student_enrollment ON students.id = student_enrollment.student_id WHERE student_enrollment.progress='In Progress';

SELECT course_name, COUNT(course_id) as total_students FROM student_enrollment JOIN courses ON student_enrollment.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING total_students > 3 ORDER BY total_students DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_status, progress_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN progress ON enrollments.enrollment_id = progress.enrollment_id WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_description IS NOT NULL;

SELECT students.student_name, courses.course_name, enrollments.enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT progress_id, progress_status, progress_date FROM progress WHERE progress_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY progress_date;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT enrollment_id, grade FROM grades WHERE enrollment_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN grades ON enrollments.enrollment_id = grades.enrollment_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 3;
